content: looking for a fun and functional way to add color and texture to your home the **wheat stitch™ nesting baskets** are the perfect solution this set of four beautifully designed baskets showcases the elegant * wheat stitch™ 1 * creating a unique eye-catching texture made with *bulky weight yarn* these baskets have a sturdy durable fabric that holds its shape while keeping your space stylishly organized whether you re storing craft supplies toys or everyday essentials these baskets bring both charm and practicality to any room the basket begins with a circular base crocheted in the round and set aside the body is worked flat and then joined to form the basket s shape next the body is slip-stitched to the base for a seamless connection finally the basket is completed with a top trim and sturdy handles a video tutorial is included with the pattern crochet hook j 6 0mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch markers 5 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 blocking mats 6 blocking combs 7 steamer 8 optional wooden circles for a flat sturdy bottom 7 inch 9 8 inch 10 9 inch 11 10 inch 12 yarn lion brand hue & me 13 80% acrylic 20% wool 137yds/125g or mary maxim titan 14 100% acrylic 80yds/85g weight 5 bulky yardage 170 192 225 320 yds yardage listed is per basket to make all 4 baskets total yardage is approximately 910yds yarn substitutions lion brand thick & quick 15 80% acrylic 20% wool 106yds/170g wecrochet brava bulky 16 100% premium acrylic 136yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain s - chain s double_crochet - double_crochet fsc - foundation single_crochet 17 rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 18 ws - wrong side gauge 11 sts and 9 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern repeat row 3-6 not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 19 sizes small medium large extra large a height 6 6 5 7 7 5 b diameter 7 8 9 10 c circumference 22 25 28 25 31 5 skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 20 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 21 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 22 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 23 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 24 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 25 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no
